useCase.name: Editing Metadata

preconditions.precondition: Researcher navigated to My Deposited Items

useCase.trigger: Researcher selects an item to edit

mainSequence.step: Researcher navigates to My Deposited Items
Repository fetches deposited items for Researcher
Deposited items are displayed to Researcher
Researcher selects an item to edit
Repository checks editing permission for Researcher
Repository updates metadata for the selected item
